data.name: Passpartout - OST
data.detailed_description:
Get the official soundtrack for Passpartout and support our beloved composers! All revenue from this package goes directly into the pockets of our composers Synkronosaurus! Reach out to them at facebook.com/synkronosaurus or @synkronosaurus

1. Passpartout Theme
2. Passpartout's Song
3. The Aristocrats
4. Oui Oui Oui
5. Fruit Bowl Serenade
6. Le Couleur Du Signe
7. 99 Luftbaguettes
8. Steve, Piano and a Bottle
9. Rich
10. Broke
11. Forgotten
12. Remembered

All tracks written, performed and produced by SYNKRONOSAURUS

Additional performances by
Nicklas Dahlin, tenor saxophone (on tracks 1, 4)
Terese Lien Evenstad, violin (on tracks 1, 2, 3, 8)
Simon Fransman, piano solo (on track 6)
Kristofer Morhed, piano solo (on track 4)
Hillevi Rasmusson Klingberg, cello (on tracks 5, 8, 12)
Daniel Schwartz, guitar solo (on track 6)

Mastered by Mattias Wessel

data.short_description: Get the official soundtrack for Passpartout and support our beloved composers! All revenue from this package goes directly into the pockets of our composers Synkronosaurus! Reach out to them at facebook.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Some system that operates
  • Processor: Something that plays music
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Enough for you to render the play button
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Something that makes noise
  • Additional Notes: This is just music files
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Some system that operates
  • Processor: Something that plays music
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D enhanced music accelerator X9001 (it's just music files though)
  • Storage: 121 MB available space
  • Sound Card: The best sound card in the world
  • Additional Notes: This is just music files
